summary: This document is a police report detailing a complaint of aggravated harassment involving Jeffrey Epstein and a female victim. The report includes information about the victim, the suspect, and witness statements regarding the harassment incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the suspect in a complaint of aggravated harassment against a female victim.

persons.name: Anne Regan
persons.context: Anne Regan is listed as a witness who provided information regarding the harassment incident involving the victim and the suspect.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is accused of harassing the victim, K, leading to the filing of this complaint.
Anne Regan is a witness to the harassment incident involving K.

events.title: Harassment Incident
events.description: The victim reported that Epstein called her and threatened to burn her painting, which led to the filing of the complaint.

keyFacts: The victim, K, reported receiving threats from Jeffrey Epstein regarding her personal property.
The incident occurred on July 11, 1996, and was reported on August 20, 1996.
Anne Regan is identified as a witness to the harassment incident.
The report indicates that the victim was fearful for her safety due to Epstein's actions.
The case was classified as aggravated harassment and was closed.
